13431.「……ああ 届いてくれた。\n <pc>さん 私です！\n リュナンです！:
...Oh, you got it. <pc> It's me! It's
Lunan!

13432.「……っと 大声は マズいですね。\n 申し訳ないですが <pc>さんも\n お:
I'm sorry, but I don't think it's a good idea
to talk so loud. I'm sorry, but please be
quiet, <pc>.

13433.「じつは 私 今 メギドロームの\n 手下の魔物に 捕まっている状態なんです。:
As a matter of fact, I am currently in the
captivity of Megidrome's monsters.

13434.「そうです。この間の会話のときに 突然\n 奴らが 私の家に押し入ってきて……。:
That's right. During our conversation the other day, all of a sudden they broke into my house... and thanks to them Sheba's mirror is
broken.

13435.「この会話も そのとき 隠しもった\n 鏡の破片を使って おこなってるんです。\:
I'm doing this conversation using a piece of
mirror I had hidden at that time. I'm so glad
we were able to get in touch.

13436.「ここは どうやら エルトナ大陸の\n 夢幻の森…… 捨てられた城のどこかの\n:
This place is apparently the Dream Forest of
Eltona Continent... some building in an
Abandoned Castle.

13437.「そんなワケで <pc>さん。\n ご迷惑だとは思いますが どうか 私を\n 助:
That's why <pc>. I know this is
inconvenient for you, but could you please
come and help me?

13438.「ありがとうございます。\n 今は <pc>さんだけが 頼りですよ。:
Thank you very much. Right now <pc>
is the only thing I can rely on.

13439.「奴らに 見つかるとマズいので\n 今後 連絡は ひかえるようにしますが\n ど:
I will refrain from contacting you in the
future because I don't want them to find out.

13440.「よかった！……と言いたいところですが\n あなたは 今 たくさんの頼まれごとを:
Good for you! ...but it seems you have a lot
of favors to do right now.

13441.「私のほうは まだ しばらく\n 持ちこたえられそうですから\n まずは そちら:
I think I can hold out for a while yet, so
please go and clean that up first.

13442.「……そうですか。\n 残念ですけど しかたないですね。:
I see. I'm sorry to hear that, but it can't be
helped.

13443.「それでも もし……もし 少しでも\n 私を 助けてくれてもいいと思ったなら\n:
Still, if... if you think you can help me in
any way, please talk to this mirror again.

13445.「さっそくですが お願いです。\n ご迷惑だとは わかっていますが\n どうか:
I'm sorry to bother you, but I have a favor to
ask. I know this is inconvenient for you, but
could you please come and help us?

13447.「よく こんな危険な場所まで……\n 本当に お礼の言葉もありません。:
I don't know how you managed to get to such a
dangerous place... I really can't thank you
enough.

13448.「メギドロームが 私をさらい\n こんな場所に 閉じ込めたのは\n ある目的を:
Megidrome took me and locked me in a place
like this to serve a purpose...

13449.「そして 奴は すでに その野望をかなえて\n 用なしとなった私は そのまま\n:
And now that he has fulfilled his ambition, I
am no longer of any use to him, and he has
left me here.

13450.「今 あなたの目の前にあるのは\n メギドロームが 私を逃がさないために張った\:
What you see in front of you now is a magical ward that Megidrome put up to keep me from escaping, and it's impossible for any normal
person to get through.

13451.「この結界を解くには <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>に\n ヒャドで とどめを:
The only way to break the barrier is to get a
Safe Passage Stone, which can only be obtained
by defeating an Incubus with Crack.

13452.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は 夢幻の森に\n 夜だけ 現れるそうです。ど:
Incubus is said to appear only at night in the
Dream Forest. Could you please bring me a Safe
Passage Stone?<yesno><close>

13453.「ありがとうございます。\n お手数をおかけして 申し訳ありませんが\n どうか:
Thank you very much. I apologize for the
trouble I have caused you.

13454.「……そうですか。\n 残念ですが しかたありませんね。\n でも 来てくれただ:
I see. I'm sorry to hear that, but it can't be
helped. But I'm glad you came.

13457.「でも その結界は トラマナ石がないと\n 解くことは できないんです。:
But the Safe Passage Stone is the only way to
break the barrier.

13458.「トラマナ石は <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>に\n ヒャドで とどめをさした:
The Safe Passage Stone is a rare stone that
can only be obtained by defeating Incubus with
Crack.

13459.「たしか <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\n 夢幻の森に 夜だけ現れるはずで:
I believe Incubus appears in Dream Forest only
at night. Please bring me the Safe Passage
Stone.

13460.トラマナ石のチカラで 結界は消し飛んだ！:
The power of the Safe Passage Stone has
obliterated the wards!

13462.「どうか それ以上は 近づかないでください！\n 今は……今は 会えません……。:
Please don't come any closer! Now... now I
can't see you...

13463.「これまで さんざん お世話になっておいて\n 顔も見せられないとは 何事かと思:
I know you must be wondering what is going on
that I can't even show my face after all you
have done for me, but please forgive me.

13464.「閉じ込められていたせいで ひどい姿ですし\n 何より 今は 自分に自信が持てな:
I look terrible because I've been locked up,
and most of all because I'm not very sure of
myself right now...

13465.「どうやら <pc>さんが\n 結界を解いてくれたおかげで\n 呪文で 脱出でき:
Apparently <pc> has broken the
warding so we can use spells to get out.

13466.「ひと足先に 失礼させていただきますね。\n くわしい話は 後ほど シーバの鏡で:
If you'll excuse me, I'd like to leave first.
We'll talk more later in Sheba's Mirror!

13539.「あなたには 私が ねらわれていた理由……\n 話しておかないわけには いきませ: I can't not tell you why I was being targeted.

13540.「私は 魔法使いの必殺技 ミラクルゾーンを\n 他者に 授けることができるという:
I am a mage who has inherited the special art
of being able to bestow upon others the mage's
special technique, the Miracle Zone.

13541.「ミラクルゾーンは ＭＰを消費せず\n 魔法を使いまくれるという 秘術。\n 強:
The 0 Zone is a magic spell that allows you to use magic without consuming MP. The more powerful you are, the more you will benefit
from it.

13542.「メギドロームは 強大にして残忍な魔術師。\n ミラクルゾーンを 覚えたら どん:
Megidrome was a mighty and brutal Magician.
There was no telling what mischief he might
unleash once he learned the 0 Zone.

13543.「そのため 技を覚えさせろという要求を\n 断ってきたのですが……今回 こばみき:
So, I have been refusing his requests to learn
the technique... but this time I couldn't
resist and gave him the 0 Zone.

13544.「ですが このままでは すませませんよ。\n 秘術の継承者として 私は\n 課せ:
But I won't let it go on like this. As heir to
the mystic arts, I will fulfill my
responsibility!

13545.「……っと <pc>さんには\n 関係のない話でしたね。\n それより 今回のお:
I'm sorry, this has nothing to do with
<pc>.... I would like to thank you
for your help this time.

13546.「あなたならば ミラクルゾーンを会得しても\n 悪事に用いることは ないでしょう:
I know that you will never use the 0 Zone for
any wrongdoing. This is the best I can do for
you.

13547.「深き知恵と 大いなる魔力を持つ者よ。\n 汝の名は <pc>。\n 今こそ 魔:
O Thou who art of deep wisdom and great magic.
Thy name is <pc>. Now let us reach
the depths of magic!

13548.「鏡を通してでも可能なのか 心配でしたが\n どうやら 無事 会得できたようです:
I was worried about whether it was possible to do it through a mirror, but it seems you have successfully accomplished it. 0 Zone. Please
make use of it.

13549.「私は これから メギドロームを探しつつ\n 奴を倒すための修行に 入ろうと思い:
I am going to start training to defeat him
while looking for Megidrome.

13550.「フフ。心配なさらないでください。\n 奴は強敵ですが 負ける気はありませんよ。:
Fufu. Don't worry. He is a formidable
opponent, but I have no intention of losing.

13551.「どうか 私の勝利を 祈っていてください。\n それでは お元気で！: Please pray for my victory. Take care, then!

41549.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a guest room with a
mirror.

41551.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a guest room with a
mirror.

41552.「……ああ <pc>さん。\n また 来てくれたんですね。\n よかった！ ひと:
...Oh <pc>. So you're here again.
That's great! I was so worried about being
alone.

41553.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a guest room with a
mirror.

41554.「助けていただいて ありがとうございました。\n 本当に <pc>さんには\n:
Thank you so much for your help. I really
appreciate all the help I've gotten from
<pc>...
